HOW RELIABLE IS MTN MOBILE MONEY?

Yes MTN Mobile Money is very realiable. Though, because their agents are everywhere, you may have a tendency of withdrawing and spending money often.

If it‚Äôs for saving, I‚Äôd prefer using a bank account instead of Mobile Money because with Mobile Money, I have that desire of withdrawing and spending, but the some sort of fear of withdrawing the money when it‚Äôs on my bank account.
